text: Zamania railway station (station code ZNA) is a small railway station located in Zamania, Ghazipur district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. == Trains == *Udyan Abha Toofan Express * Patna - Mughalsarai MEMU' *Sealdah Express *Magadh Express *Mumbai LTT SF Express *Patna - Kota Express *Upper India Express *Farakka Express *Train 18 ==See also== * Northern Railway zone * Babrala == References == Category:Railway stations in Agra district
title: Zamania railway station
